channel.title: Erling Rennemo Jellum
channel.description: Recent content on Erling Rennemo Jellum

item.description: Current projects 1. Lingua Franca I am an active contributor to the Lingua Franca project. Lingua Franca is a polyglot coordination language for concurrent, time-sensitive applications. 2. PRET machines I am interested in time-predictable CPU architectures. I am currently working on InterPRET a time-predictable multi-core CPU. 3. HW/SW codesign I am also working on languages and frameworks for hardware-software codesign targeting SoC FPGAs. Check out fpga-tidbits and reactor-chisel
